item.title: Report X-2023120106
item.description:
Report X-2023120106

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-25
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet, damaged package was unloaded from trailer and immediately removed from workflow. Package was left in Unload area for QA member discovery. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Five of the forty-seven aerosol cans have cracked and/or missing caps, permitting discharge of flammable contents. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable aerosol.

item.description:
Report X-2023110814

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet steel drum was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to the QA dept. where it was later taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Failed seal around the screw cap spout and failed welds on the carrying handle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. X-2023110795 -SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin with another leaking Hazmat. Pkg has Hazmat documentation from other carrier still on carton. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 L plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. X-2023110796 SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin with another leaking Hazmat. Pkg has Hazmat documentation from other carrier still on carton. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 L plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023110673
item.description:
Report X-2023110673

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-01
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped during sortation causing damage to the plastic jerrican. Pkg was placed in an unauthorized plastic bag then placed in repack box. Pkg was later transferred to the HMPA for inspection, reporting and proper handling. DescribePack: There is a 1/2" cut on the top corner of the 1 x 5 gal plastic jerrican. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After mishandling by personnel the pkg was placed in a lined and properly marked Hazmat salvage drum (RECOVPAIL) to await disposition.
